statements: UPDATE employee_profiles SET skills = ARRAY['HTML', 'CSS', 'JavaScript'] WHERE employee_id = 1234;
UPDATE employee_profiles SET career_history = 'Senior Developer' WHERE full_name = 'John Doe';
UPDATE employee_profiles SET full_name='John Doe', career_history='Software Engineer' WHERE employee_id=123;
UPDATE employee_profiles SET skills='{Java, Python, SQL}', achievements='{Certified Scrum Master}' WHERE employee_id=456;
UPDATE EmployeeProfile SET position='Manager' WHERE employee_id=101;
UPDATE EmployeeSkills SET years_of_experience=5, proficiency_level=4 WHERE employee_id=102 AND skill_name='Java';
UPDATE EmployeeProfile SET position = 'Senior Developer', performance_review_date = '2023-06-30' WHERE employee_id = 101;
UPDATE EmployeeSkills SET proficiency_level = 5, years_of_experience = 7 WHERE skill_id = 201 AND employee_id = 101;
UPDATE employee_profiles SET position='Manager' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE employee_skills SET skill_level=3 WHERE id=2;
UPDATE employee_profiles SET position = 'Manager', end_date = '2023-12-31' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE employee_skills SET skill_level = 5 WHERE skill_name = 'SQL';
UPDATE employee_profiles SET department = 'HR' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE skills SET proficiency_level = 5 WHERE employee_id = 3 AND skill_name = 'Python';
UPDATE employee_profiles SET department='HR', full_name='Alice Smith' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE career_history SET job_title='Senior Analyst', start_date='2022-01-01' WHERE employee_id=1;
UPDATE EmployeeProfile SET full_name = 'John Doe', email = 'john.doe@example.com' WHERE employee_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440000';
UPDATE Skills SET proficiency_level = 'Expert' WHERE employee_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440000';

UPDATE CareerHistory SET start_date = '2023-01-01', position = 'Senior Developer' WHERE employee_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
